title:
On the spectral problems of Kolmogorov and Rokhlin in the class of
  mixing automorphisms
abstract:
Let $T$ be a staircase rank-one construction with parameters $r_j \sim j^d$,
$0<d<0.2$, then its spectrum does not have the group property, and the product
$T\otimes T$ has homogeneous spectrum of multiplicity 2.
